REVIEW:rnrnThis VERSION works FLAWLESSLY.rnrnTested on: R4irnrnNo freezing like the unpatched version. Fully English, Retail version. Even works with Nintendo WFC Mystery Gift Etc. If you have an existing HeartGold Save from an unpatched version, just rename it to the name of the existing save. (usually the game name.sav)rnrnBTW, For those of you who are into that kind of stuff, but are cheap enough to download the game, but not too cheap to skip the accessory :p, the Pokewalker is available from the nintendo store separately for like $8. I\'m not exactly sure what it does, but it\'s necessary for some part of the game.

How to make it work? when I load the game it says "The save data could not be accessed.

Please turn the power off and reinsert the DS game card"
And its bullshit i just want to START the damn game! someone please show me how to make it work... (yes the game is running, but stops when it gets to that screen)
